text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Por fin, mi debut está detrás de nosotros.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. As of today, we are true<n>contenders in
the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The stage is set for us to take the Triple<n>Crown.
Now, come—show me your<n>strategic acumen.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Our path leads to the Classics, but they<n>are still
some way off. What races should<n>we attempt in
my junior year?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf aims to demonstrate her<n>
superiority by deliberately taking the<n>thorniest
road—the Classic Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Because of that, I don't want her to push<n>herself
too hard while she's still in her<n>junior year. The
Saudi Arabia Royal Cup<n>seems like a safe choice.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ¿Oh? Qué inesperado.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I thought you might opt for the Asahi<n>Hai Futurity
Stakes, or perhaps the<n>Hopeful Stakes.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Are they not where the best of the<n>juniors are
crowned?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's right, but we're already setting our<n>sights
high with the Classic Triple Crown.<n>The last thing
we need is to make our<n>agenda any harsher.
choice_data_list: No estamos tratando de ser los mejores de los juniors.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Jaj... Ya veo. Me gusta cómo piensas.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Entonces, será la Saudi Arabia R.C.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Con eso decidido, deberíamos programar<n>nuestro próximo—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Patter, patter, patter...

text_block_list.name: Reportero A
text_block_list.text: ¡Ahí está! ¡Symboli Rudolf! ¡Por aquí!

text_block_list.name: Reportero B
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations on your debut! Do you<n>have a
message for your fans?
choice_data_list: Lo siento, estamos un poco ocupados ahora...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I know it, we're being swarmed<n>by
reporters. Rudolf needs to rest after<n>her debut, so
I try to fend them off,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
No need to shield me, Trainer. Let me<n>deal with
them.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Of course. As I said before the race, the<n>eyes of
the world are on us. We mustn't<n>waste that
opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I will be happy to take your questions.<n>One at a
time, if you please.

text_block_list.name: Reportero A
text_block_list.text:
I'll start! So, now that you've made your<n>racing
debut, what's next for Symboli<n>Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, I hope to claim the Classic<n>Triple
Crown. To that end, I will<n>continue to compete as
a junior...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It takes several hours for Symboli Rudolf<n>to
answer all of the reporters' questions<n>to her
satisfaction. By the time we get<n>back to the
academy, it's already<n>evening.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Bien entonces, supongo que aquí es donde<n>nos separamos.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Rest well, Trainer. You must be<n>exhausted after
today.
choice_data_list: Al menos te acompañaré al dormitorio.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm not going to the dorm. I thought I<n>might
attend to some student council<n>business before
turning in.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
At this hour. The press interviews<n>concluded
earlier than I anticipated.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Which is to say, I fully expected to be<n>accosted
by reporters after the race.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You may not have heard that they were<n>coming,
but the members of the press do<n>not always
observe proper protocol.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, many reporters would prefer to<n>hear
off-the-cuff reactions rather than<n>prepared
responses.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
They will naturally come during the<n>moments after
a race, and all the more<n>so when the interviewee
puts forward a<n>spotless image.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It sounds like she was a lot more<n>prepared than I
was. I shouldn't have let<n>myself be caught
flat-footed like that.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: No tienes nada por lo que disculparte.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
As the public face of the student body,<n>I've had
more than my share of dealings<n>with the media.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You too shall get used to them in time,<n>like it or
not. After all, you are now the<n>Emperor's gate
warden.
choice_data_list: (Ahora ella es la que me anima...)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But we have strayed off topic. I have<n>work to
attend to.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
To be clear, Trainer, I am not exerting<n>myself
simply for the fun of it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now that I've made my debut, my<n>schedule will be
packed with training<n>and races.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But I have no intention of shirking my<n>student
council duties.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: The Emperor must be the master of boththe pen and the sword, or she is noEmperor at all.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
All of which will only be possible if I<n>take care of
my health, of course. Rest<n>assured, I will not
neglect that either.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ahora, a menos que me equivoque, este asunto está<n>resuelto.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Te veré mañana. Buenas noches,<n>Entrenador.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Con eso, ella se va, y no puedo detenerla.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf is an incredible racer,<n>perceptive
about the world around her,<n>and attentive to her
own needs. Most of<n>the time, she probably
doesn't need me<n>at all.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But I want to do everything I can to<n>make myself
useful on the few occasions<n>when she does.
Anything to help her<n>achieve her dream!
